1617430409_15FbScWG2wGbwWdjTCfaq8rHHutm4.body:
The centralization and surveillance of all digital transactions.

Mass political and ideological indoctrination via all media and institutions (right and left).

Society-wide mental pathology fueled by smartphones, social media, and big tech.

Loss of basic mutual respect and dignity for all people.

Systematic data gathering and analysis of all observable online behavior.

The control of a corrupt, totalitarian, aristocratic management class in government and business (right and left).
